Text: Is it possible to play this on a ps3 emu?

how do i install this? i finished the download and have the eboot fix but i dont know how to combine the parts. im use the trueblue dongle. help! :D

i finally got it to work! you must have the true blue dongle:
1. extract the game using winrar
2. download the eboot patch here
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7396088/Dragons_Dogma_EBOOT_PATCH_TB_PS3_-_BORG
3. copy to an external hdd
4.download and install "true blue cfw2"
5.download and install "true blue update 2.7"
6.play the game!
P.S. i use rogero manager :D
